description:
I would love to welcome you to my Brand New  Brooklyn apartment. Small and cozy in a very safe neighborhood with easy public parking. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. My place is close to the Golf Course, Parks, and Ceasar's Bay Shopping Center.  Literally a couple blocks away from the Ocean. You’ll love my place because the experience will be a real New York one.

Brand New and Modern.

Total Privacy. There is no shared space and you will have your own entrance.

Real Brooklyn experience!

Public Transportation 
B64 and B1 are both 1 block away. D train is less than 3/4 of a mile away. Uber everywhere.....

Welcome to NYC...

Things to do in NYC
www.airbnb.com/things-to-do/new-york
name: Brand New small 1 Bedroom apt in Brooklyn
review: Nice place for a quick visit, host super communicative and flexible. Be ready to walk or use uber/lyft/taxi to get anywhere as the closest subway station is a half-mile walk.
